title: The Singapore Sling Recipe
full_text:
The Singapore Sling Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1
ounce
gin
(Tanqueray or Beefeater recommended)
1
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1
ounce
Cherry Heering
or Bols Cherry Brandy
1
ounce
Benedictine
(optional)
Chilled club soda
3
dashes
Angostura bitters
Pineapple spear, cherry, and/or
orange slice
for garnish (optional)
Directions
Combine gin, lime juice, Cherry Heering, and Benedictine in a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with club soda, and dash bitters into the drink. Garnish with a pineapple spear, cherry, orange slice or nothing at all.
Special equipment
Collins glass
Gin
Brandy & Cognac
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
